name: Lockdown
description:
Lockdown is a 2-10 Person Multiplayer Survival/Horror Escape game. You are placed in a city that has been placed on Lockdown, infested with undead zombies hunting the survivors. Your goal is to escape the town by finding a Key Card, and escaping through the airlock located at the edge of town. You will battle through the undead, as well as other survivors, to escape Lockdown.

Please feel free to join the official Lockdown Discord and chat with other players!

https://discord.gg/8D3cmqU
